snippet.title: Valeguard Trailer
snippet.description:
On Steam: 
 https://store.steampowered.com/app/788700/ValeGuard/

ValeGuard is an interesting blend of Turn-Based City-Building and Real-Time Combat.  Build up your town in the day and defend against hoards of monsters at night with towers, troops, and powerful heroes.  Early Access May 11th, 2018.
